_TermsCheckbox: Terms of Service translations for English

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.description: The terms and conditions for using the app

1.title: Acceptance of Terms
1.content: Using the app constitutes full acceptance of these terms. If you do not agree to these terms, please discontinue use of the app. These terms are designed to ensure safe and pleasant use for all users and to maintain the religious and moral values of the community.

2.title: Service Description
content: AKHLADATE is a dating platform designed for the religious public. The service allows users to create a profile, search for potential partners and communicate.
The platform is designed for those looking for serious and committed relationships while maintaining religious and traditional values.

3.title: Registration and User Account
items: The user undertakes to provide true and accurate information during registration
Minimum age for using the app: 18+ years
It is forbidden to create more than one account per user
The user is responsible for maintaining password confidentiality and access details

4.title: Code of Conduct
items: Behave respectfully and decently towards other users
Do not publish offensive, misleading or illegal content
Do not harass or harm other users in any way
Maintain modesty and traditional values in all communication

5.title: Copyright and Content
content: All content in the app is copyright protected. The user grants a license to use the content they upload for the purpose of operating the service.
The user warrants that the content he uploads does not infringe the copyrights of others and that it is his full property.

6.title: Limitation of Liability
content: The company is not responsible for the results of using the app, including dates, meetings or relationships formed through it.
The user bears full responsibility for his behavior and decisions when using the service.

7.title: Changes to Terms
content: The company reserves the right to update the terms from time to time. Users will be notified of material changes.
Continued use of the application after receiving the notification constitutes agreement to the updated terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Our privacy and data protection policy

1.title: Information Collection
content: We collect information you provide during registration: name, age, location, photos and additional information for profile creation.
We may also collect technical information such as IP address, browser type, and application usage data.

2.title: Information Use
items: Displaying the profile to other users in the system
Improving the service and personalizing recommendations
Communication regarding the service and important updates

3.title: Information Sharing
content: We do not share personal information with third parties, except as required by law or for the operation of the service.
In exceptional cases where we are required to share information, we will do so in accordance with legal requirements and with maximum protection of privacy.

4.title: Data Security
content: We employ advanced security measures to protect your information, including encryption and two-factor authentication.
Our servers are protected by advanced security technologies and are located in secure data centers.

5.title: Your Rights
items: Access your personal information stored in the system
Delete your account and information completely
Limit the use of information for specific purposes

6.title: Cookies
content: We use cookies to improve user experience, save preferences and for analytics.
You can set your browser to block cookies, but this may affect the functionality of the application.

7.title: Contact Us
content: For privacy questions, you can contact us at: privacy@akhladate.com
We commit to responding to inquiries within 48 hours and handling every request professionally and quickly.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Welcome to Israel's Free Dating Site

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: AkhlaDate was founded with the mission of connecting hearts in Israel and providing a safe, free and accessible platform for anyone looking for true love. We believe that everyone deserves to find their partner, regardless of economic status or social background.

free.title: Completely Free
free.content: All features on the site are available for free, with no hidden costs.

safety.title: Maximum Safety
safety.content: Advanced security system to protect your privacy and safety.

community.title: Israeli Community
community.content: Specializing in matching the Israeli audience with an understanding of local culture.

technology.title: Advanced Technology
technology.content: Smart matching algorithms to find the perfect match for you.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: AkhlaDate was founded in 2025 by a team of Israeli developers and designers who understood that there is a need for a real and free dating site in Israel. We believe that love should not cost money, and that everyone deserves to find their happiness.

list.respect: Respect and mutual respect between all users
list.transparency: Complete transparency with no hidden costs
list.privacy: Protection of users' privacy and safety
list.service: Excellent customer service and ongoing support

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.subtitle: Welcome to Israel's Free Dating Site

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: Using the AkhlaDate site constitutes full acceptance of the terms of use detailed here. If you do not agree to these terms, please refrain from using the site.

freeService.title: Free Service
freeService.content: AkhlaDate is a completely free dating site for all users in Israel. We are committed to keeping the service free and accessible to everyone.

conduct.title: Proper Behavior
conduct.content: Site users undertake to behave with respect and civility. It is forbidden to publish offensive, sexually explicit content or any other content that may harm other users.

accuracy.title: Information Accuracy
accuracy.content: Users undertake to provide true and accurate information in their profile. The use of a fictitious identity or false information may lead to account blocking.

ageRequirement.title: Minimum Age
ageRequirement.content: The use of the site is permitted only for users aged 18 and over. We reserve the right to check the age of users and block accounts of minors.

liability.title: Responsibility
liability.content: The site is not responsible for meetings or relationships formed through it. Users bear full responsibility for their actions and personal safety.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Welcome to Israel's Free Dating Site

dataCollection.title: Information Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you provide during registration to the site, including name, email address, date of birth and profile pictures. The information is collected in order to provide you with a tailored and safe dating experience.

dataUsage.title: Information Use
dataUsage.content: Your information is used to match profiles, improve the service and maintain site safety. We will not share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent.

dataSecurity.title: Information Security
dataSecurity.content: We use advanced encryption technologies to protect your personal information. All data is encrypted and stored on secure servers.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access your personal information, update it or delete your account at any time. You can contact us with any question regarding your privacy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For further questions about privacy policy, you can contact us at: privacy@akhladate.com

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Welcome to Israel's Free Dating Site

welcome.title: We'd Love to Hear from You!
welcome.content: AkhlaDate is Israel's free dating site. We are here to help you find love and to answer any questions you may have. Contact us in any way that is convenient for you.

free.question: Is the service really free?
free.answer: Yes! AkhlaDate is a completely free dating site for all users in Israel.

deleteAccount.question: How can I delete my account?
deleteAccount.answer: You can delete your account at any time through the profile settings or by contacting us.

dataProtection.question: Is my information protected?
dataProtection.answer: Absolutely! We use advanced encryption technologies to protect your privacy.
